divs: Sighting DetailsLet the dog outside.I seen a flash over the trees it looked just like a movie projector light.It was just a second.Thought I was seeing things.After a min or two a light appeard behind the tree same area I seen the flash,i watched it move slower than an airplane noiseless and it shuffled,weird.Feeling like you,I CAN SEE YOU feeling.No flashing lights went over my head southeast.then faded out,disappered.Lasted 5min.
